name: Dispenser that can shear players helmets
description: So now in hardcore you can take off the curse of binding carved pumpkin...
steps: If you want this to work on all 4 sides change ^ ^1 ^1 to the other 3 sides
You can also change this to other armor slots as well

blocks.command: execute as @a[nbt={equipment:{head:{}}}] at @s rotated ~ 0 if block ^ ^1 ^1 minecraft:dispenser[triggered=true]{Items:[{id:"minecraft:shears"}]} run item replace block ^ ^1 ^1 container.0 from entity @s armor.head

execute as @a[nbt={equipment:{head:{}}}] at @s rotated ~ 0 if block ^ ^1 ^1 minecraft:dispenser[triggered=true]{Items:[{id:"minecraft:shears"}]} run playsound minecraft:entity.sheep.shear ambient @s ~ ~ ~
execute as @a[nbt={equipment:{head:{}}}] at @s rotated ~ 0 if block ^ ^1 ^1 minecraft:dispenser[triggered=true]{Items:[{id:"minecraft:shears"}]} run item replace entity @s armor.head with air

name: Object Text Component
description: Put Block Textures in your text or other places!
steps: Each row has a different example that you may use and combine

blocks.command: data modify block ~ ~1 ~ front_text.messages[0] set value {"sprite":"block/diamond_block"}

name: Walking / Pathfinding Mannequins
description: Make Mannequins walk around your world!
steps: Use only row 1 for basic movement toward player. Remember to tag the mannequin!
Use only row 2 for walking on path blocks. Remember to tag the mannequin!
Use only rows 3,4,5 for pathfinding. You will need to tag and use a wandering trader. Remember to tag both!

blocks.command: execute as @a at @s anchored eyes facing entity @e[type=minecraft:mannequin,tag=followMann,limit=1,sort=nearest] eyes anchored feet positioned ^ ^ ^1 rotated as @s positioned ^ ^ ^-1 unless entity @s[distance=..0.5] run execute as @e[type=minecraft:mannequin,tag=followMann,limit=1,sort=nearest] at @s if entity @p[distance=2..] facing entity @p feet run tp @s ^ ^ ^.15 ~ ~
execute as @e[tag=blockMann] at @s if block ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:magenta_glazed_terracotta[facing=east] run data modify entity @s Motion[0] set value -0.2
execute as @e[tag=blockMann] at @s if block ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:magenta_glazed_terracotta[facing=east] run data merge entity @s {Rotation:[90f,0f]}
execute as @e[tag=blockMann] at @s if block ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:magenta_glazed_terracotta[facing=south] run data modify entity @s Motion[2] set value -0.2
execute as @e[tag=blockMann] at @s if block ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:magenta_glazed_terracotta[facing=south] run data merge entity @s {Rotation:[180f,0f]}
execute as @e[tag=blockMann] at @s if block ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:magenta_glazed_terracotta[facing=west] run data modify entity @s Motion[0] set value 0.2
execute as @e[tag=blockMann] at @s if block ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:magenta_glazed_terracotta[facing=west] run data merge entity @s {Rotation:[-90f,0f]}
execute as @e[tag=blockMann] at @s if block ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:magenta_glazed_terracotta[facing=north] run data modify entity @s Motion[2] set value 0.2
execute as @e[tag=blockMann] at @s if block ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:magenta_glazed_terracotta[facing=north] run data merge entity @s {Rotation:[0f,0f]}
execute as @e[tag=blockMann] at @s unless block ^ ^ ^1 air run data modify entity @s Motion[1] set value 0.2
execute as @e[tag=mannAI] at @s if entity @e[tag=wanderMann,limit=1,sort=nearest] run tp @e[tag=wanderMann,limit=1,sort=nearest] ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

execute as @e[tag=mannAI] at @s unless data entity @s wander_target if entity @e[type=item,nbt={Item:{components:{"minecraft:custom_data":{mannFollow:1}}}}] run data merge entity @s {wander_target:[I;0,0,0]}

execute as @e[tag=mannAI] at @s if entity @e[type=item,nbt={Item:{components:{"minecraft:custom_data":{mannFollow:1}}}}] run data modify entity @s wander_target[0] set from entity @e[type=item,nbt={Item:{components:{"minecraft:custom_data":{mannFollow:1}}}},limit=1,sort=nearest] Pos[0]

execute as @e[tag=mannAI] at @s if entity @e[type=item,nbt={Item:{components:{"minecraft:custom_data":{mannFollow:1}}}}] run data modify entity @s wander_target[1] set from entity @e[type=item,nbt={Item:{components:{"minecraft:custom_data":{mannFollow:1}}}},limit=1,sort=nearest] Pos[1]

execute as @e[tag=mannAI] at @s if entity @e[type=item,nbt={Item:{components:{"minecraft:custom_data":{mannFollow:1}}}}] run data modify entity @s wander_target[2] set from entity @e[type=item,nbt={Item:{components:{"minecraft:custom_data":{mannFollow:1}}}},limit=1,sort=nearest] Pos[2]
execute as @e[tag=mannAI] at @s run effect give @s minecraft:invisibility 100 1 true
execute as @e[tag=mannAI] at @s run item replace entity @s weapon.mainhand with air

name: How To Summon and Customize Mannequins
description: This simple tutorials gives you all the methods that you can do to summon and customize an Mannequin in Minecraft!
steps: You may take any of these commands with the nbt components and combine them
Just make sure you put commas and components in the right place!

name: Prevent Items From Despawning
description: This simple tutorial makes it possible for items to never despawn!
steps: Use Command Row 1 or Command Row 2 to either summon the item with tag or give items near you with tags
Put down a repeat command block in a spawn chunk or area that is always loaded and put Command Row 3 inside

Here you can either have the age set to -32768 or -1. -32768 will make the item never despawn even if the command block is turned off! -1 will despawn items after 5 minutes if the command block is off but may be laggier. The choice is yours!
Have a lever running the command and your good to go!

blocks.command: execute as @e[type=item,distance=..5] run data merge entity @s {Item:{components:{"minecraft:custom_data":{noDespawn:1}}}}
execute as @e[type=item,nbt={Item:{components:{"minecraft:custom_data":{noDespawn:1}}}},nbt=!{Age:-32768s}] run data merge entity @s {Age:-32768}
